divs: Sighting DetailsI was going from my garage to my house when I looked up like I always do when I spotted an object going across the sky.it reminded me of when I was younger and would watch russia's sputnick cross the sky.what got my attention was it was really traveling then changed direction.it made a 90 degree turn and sped off across the sky to the west then dissappeared.I just stood there looking up seeing nothing more than stars.this was a very clear night with no lights aroung.I live in a rual area and always watch the stars when I can.
trends: There have been no other sightings in alma
This sighting has never been favorited.
